query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notification_logs` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `applicant_email` varchar(320) NOT NULL,
  `application_id` int,
  `notification_type` enum('status_change','document_upload','interview_scheduled','interview_rescheduled','general') NOT NULL,
  `subject` varchar(500) NOT NULL,
  `content` text NOT NULL,
  `sent_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  `status` enum('sent','failed','pending') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'sent',
  `error_message` text,
  `metadata` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `notification_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

  `application_id` int,

  `error_message` text,
  `metadata` text,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT (now()),
  CONSTRAINT `notification_logs_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
